entries.title: FTX says $415 million of crypto was hacked
entries.description: Bankrupt crypto firm FTX said on Tuesday that $415 million worth of crypto was hacked from the exchange’s accounts, representing a sizeable portion of the

entries.title: Meta's oversight board calls for more inclusive adult nudity policy
entries.description: Meta's oversight board calls for a more inclusive adult nudity policy after two posts by transgender and nonbinary people were removed.

entries.title: Apple announces new Macs with its most powerful chips yet
entries.description: Apple announced new Macs on Tuesday that can be purchased with either M2 Pro or M2 Max chips, the most powerful Apple processors yet.
